title: BROKE vs PRO Gaming Laptop vs Desktop PC
description: New Customer Exclusive  Get a Free 240gb SSD at Micro Center:    Micro Center Platinum Collection:  ASUS TUF Gaming A15 15.6" Laptop  Gray:  HyperX Pulsefire FPS Pro RGB Gaming Mouse:  Micro Center Mouse Pad Black:    Micro Center Ken Collection:  Intel Core i5-10400:  MSI B460M PRO-VDH WIFI Motherboard:  MSI NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti Gaming X Graphics Card:  G.Skill Ripjaws V 16GB (2 x 8GB) DDR4-3200:  Inland Professional 1TB SSD:  MSI MPG A650GF 650 Watt 80 Plus Gold ATX Fully Modular Power Supply:  MSI MAG Forge 100R Computer Case  Black:  MSI MAG Core Liquid 240mm aRGB Water Cooling Kit:  HyperX Alloy Origins Core Tenkeyless Mechanical Gaming Keyboard:  HyperX Pulsefire FPS Pro RGB Gaming Mouse:  HyperX FURY S Pro Extended Gaming Mouse Pad:  Brother QL-810W Ultra Fast Label Printer with Wireless Networking:   My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  I have a TikTok!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
